mapper.select: select customerno "customerno", password "password", failcount "failcount", registersource "registersource", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime", source "source", onlinestatus "onlinestatus", loginsource "loginsource" from cas.aus_authone where customerno = #{customerno} for update

select customerno "customerno", password "password", failcount "failcount", registersource "registersource", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime", source "source", onlinestatus "onlinestatus", loginsource "loginsource" from cas.aus_authone where customerno = #{customerno}
mapper.insert:
insert into cas.aus_authone( customerno,password,failcount,registersource,insertdate, inserttime,updatedate,updatetime,source,onlinestatus, loginsource ) values
( #{item.customerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.password, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.failcount, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.registersource, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inserttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatetime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.source, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.onlinestatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.loginsource, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
